h2_title: Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide
content: Though it's tempting to create distance, it's better to stay close to the Red Boy during this fight. Not only will this allow you to take advantage of those pauses we mentioned previously, but it also means he's less likely to use projectiles. If you're too far away, he'll shoot fire along the ground to try and reach you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Boy.md', within the main section titled 'Red Boy', specifically from the subsection 'Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Though it's tempting to create distance, it's better to stay close to the Red Boy during this fight. Not only will this allow you to take advantage of those pauses we mentioned previously, but it also means he's less likely to use projectiles. If you're too far away, he'll shoot fire along the ground to try and reach you.
